org.apache.taverna.commandline

Class CommandLineOptionsImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.taverna.commandline.CommandLineOptionsImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CommandLineOptions

    public class CommandLineOptionsImpl
extends Object
implements CommandLineOptions
    Handles the processing of command line arguments for enacting a workflow. This class encapsulates all command line options, and exposes them through higher-level accessors. Upon creation it checks the validity of the command line options and raises an InvalidOptionException if they are invalid.
    Author:
    Stuart Owen, David Withers

      • getInputFiles

        public String[] getInputFiles()
        Returns an array that alternates between a portname and path to a file containing the input values. Therefore the array will always contain an even number of elements
        Specified by:

        Returns:

        Description copied from interface: CommandLineOptions
        Returns an array that alternates between a portname and an input values. Therefore the array will always contain an even number of elements.
        Specified by:
        getInputValues in interface CommandLineOptions
        Returns:

      • getInputBundle

        public String getInputBundle()
        Description copied from interface: CommandLineOptions
        Return the path for a data bundle which should be used for input values. This option can't be used together with CommandLineOptions.getInputFiles() or CommandLineOptions.getInputValues()
